required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Turkish Validation Study of Endometriosis Health Profile -30 (EHP-30) Test
clinical_study.official_title: Turkish Validation of Endometriosis Health Profile -30 (EHP-30) Test

lead_sponsor.agency: Kanuni Sultan Suleyman Training and Research Hospital

clinical_study.source: Kanuni Sultan Suleyman Training and Research Hospital

brief_summary.textblock: For the Turkish validation Study of the Endometriosis Health Profile test (EHP-30) consisting of 30 questions, this 30-question test will be applied to 228 patients after 2 different translations to be applied after the translation of this 30-question test sworn translator to the patients who have been surgically diagnosed with endometriosis.

detailed_description.textblock: The appointment of the patients consists of patients who were surgically diagnosed with Endometriosis in our clinic. English and Turkish translation will be verified after 2 different sworn translators.

primary_outcome.measure: Turkish Validation of Endometriosis Health Profile -30 (EHP-30) Test
primary_outcome.description: The Turkish validation study of the Endometriosis Health Profile -30EHP-30 test, which shows the general quality of life of endometriosis patients, will be performed and the use of Turkish language will be provided.

intervention.intervention_name: Endo Patients with Endometriosis Health Profile -30 (EHP-30) Test
intervention.description: The appointment of the patients consists of patients who were surgically diagnosed with Endometriosis in our clinic.

study_pop.textblock: Female patients between the ages of 18-45 who were surgically diagnosed with endometriosis in our clinic will be included in the study. Persons with a known psychiatric illness, pregnant or using anti-depressant medication will be excluded from the study. Patients will be asked the questions of the online EHP-30 form and the answers given will be evaluated in terms of validation.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- being surgically diagnosed with endometriosis
- Age between 18- 45
- not being pregnant
Exclusion Criteria:
- have been diagnosed with endometriosis by ultrasound
- above 45 and under 18 years old
- use psichiatrig drugs
- being diagnosed with a psychiatric illness

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Kanuni Sultan Suleyman Training and Research Hospital
